title: Two Storied house close to Etulkotte junction and Parliament road
details:
Architecturally designed two storied newly renovated house for sale at Etulkotte
Spacious sitting and dinning area
Five bed rooms with attached bathrooms
Modern fitted pantry and wet kitchen
Servant room and bathroom
Two covered parking
Facing 20ft wide road
150 meters to parliament road
All the amenities are close near by
High residential area
Ideal for office or residence
